sn35.90:1.1: “Eja, bhikkhave, rogo, eja gando, eja sallam.
sn35.90:1.2: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, tathagato anejo viharati vitasallo.
sn35.90:1.3: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi akankheyya ‘anejo vihareyyam vitasallo’ti,
sn35.90:1.4: cakkhum na manneyya, cakkhusmim na manneyya, cakkhuto na manneyya, cakkhu meti na manneyya;
sn35.90:1.5: rupe na manneyya, rupesu na manneyya, rupato na manneyya, rupa meti na manneyya;
sn35.90:1.6: cakkhuvinnanam na manneyya, cakkhuvinnanasmim na manneyya, cakkhuvinnanato na manneyya, cakkhuvinnanam meti na manneyya;
sn35.90:1.7: cakkhusamphassam na manneyya, cakkhusamphassasmim na manneyya, cakkhusamphassato na manneyya, cakkhusamphasso meti na manneyya.
sn35.90:1.8: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na manneyya, tasmimpi na manneyya, tatopi na manneyya, tam meti na manneyya.
sn35.90:2.3: jivham na manneyya, jivhaya na manneyya, jivhato na manneyya, jivha meti na manneyya;
sn35.90:2.7: yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na manneyya, tasmimpi na manneyya, tatopi na manneyya, tam meti na manneyya.
sn35.90:3.2: manam na manneyya, manasmim na manneyya, manato na manneyya, mano meti na manneyya;
sn35.90:3.6: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na manneyya, tasmimpi na manneyya, tatopi na manneyya, tam meti na manneyya;
sn35.90:3.7: sabbam na manneyya, sabbasmim na manneyya, sabbato na manneyya, sabbam meti na manneyya.
sn35.90:4.1: So evam amannamano na kincipi loke upadiyati.
sn35.90:4.2: Anupadiyam na paritassati. Aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
sn35.90:4.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
